scripts.build: npm run copy-deps && echo 'Static files ready in public directory'
scripts.copy-deps: cp node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.min.js public/ && cp node_modules/@pixi/tilemap/dist/pixi-tilemap.js public/ && cp node_modules/pixi-viewport/dist/pixi_viewport.umd.cjs public/pixi-viewport.js
scripts.dev: npm run copy-deps && cd public && python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000
